verses.verse: And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6950>gathered<s%> all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6950>together<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, These are the <S%H1697>words<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%>, that ye should <S%H6213>do<s%> them.

<S%H8337>Six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall <S%H4399>work<s%> be <S%H6213>done<s%>, but on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> there shall be to you an holy <S%H6944>day<s%>, a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of <S%H7677>rest<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: whosoever <S%H6213>doeth<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> therein shall be put to <S%H4191>death<s%>. an: Heb. holiness
Ye shall <S%H1197>kindle<s%> no <S%H784>fire<s%> throughout your <S%H4186>habitations<s%> upon the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, This is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H3947>Take<s%> ye from among you an <S%H8641>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>: <S%H3605>whosoever<s%> is of a <S%H5081>willing<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>, let him <S%H935>bring<s%> it, an <S%H8641>offering<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and <S%H5178>brass<s%>,
And <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H713>purple<s%>, and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> <S%H8438><s%>, and fine <S%H8336>linen<s%>, and <S%H5795>goats'<s%> hair,
And <S%H352>rams'<s%> <S%H5785>skins<s%> dyed <S%H119>red<s%>, and <S%H8476>badgers'<s%> <S%H5785>skins<s%>, and <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>,
And <S%H8081>oil<s%> for the <S%H3974>light<s%>, and <S%H1314>spices<s%> for <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and for the <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%>,
And <S%H7718>onyx<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%>, and <S%H68>stones<s%> to be <S%H4394>set<s%> for the <S%H646>ephod<s%>, and for the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%>.
And every <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H3820>hearted<s%> among you shall <S%H935>come<s%>, and <S%H6213>make<s%> all that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H6680>commanded<s%>;

The <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, his <S%H168>tent<s%>, and his <S%H4372>covering<s%>, his <S%H7165>taches<s%>, and his <S%H7175>boards<s%>, his <S%H1280>bars<s%>, his <S%H5982>pillars<s%>, and his <S%H134>sockets<s%>,
The <S%H727>ark<s%>, and the <S%H905>staves<s%> thereof, with the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%>, and the <S%H6532>vail<s%> of the <S%H4539>covering<s%>,
The <S%H7979>table<s%>, and his <S%H905>staves<s%>, and all his <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, and the <S%H6440>shewbread<s%> <S%H3899><s%>,
The <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> also for the <S%H3974>light<s%>, and his <S%H3627>furniture<s%>, and his <S%H5216>lamps<s%>, with the <S%H8081>oil<s%> for the <S%H3974>light<s%>,

And the <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H4196>altar<s%>, and his <S%H905>staves<s%>, and the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and the <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%>, and the <S%H4539>hanging<s%> for the door at the entering <S%H6607>in<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>,

The <S%H4196>altar<s%> of burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%>, with his <S%H5178>brasen<s%> <S%H4345>grate<s%>, his <S%H905>staves<s%>, and all his <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, the <S%H3595>laver<s%> and his <S%H3653>foot<s%>,
The <S%H7050>hangings<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%>, his <S%H5982>pillars<s%>, and their <S%H134>sockets<s%>, and the <S%H4539>hanging<s%> for the <S%H8179>door<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%>,
The <S%H3489>pins<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%>, and the <S%H3489>pins<s%> of the <S%H2691>court<s%>, and their <S%H4340>cords<s%>,

The <S%H899>cloths<s%> of <S%H8278>service<s%>, to do <S%H8334>service<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and the <S%H899>garments<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, to minister in the priest's <S%H3547>office<s%>.
And all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3318>departed<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And they <S%H935>came<s%>, every <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> stirred him <S%H5375>up<s%>, and every one whom his <S%H7307>spirit<s%> made <S%H5068>willing<s%>, and they <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD'S<s%> <S%H8641>offering<s%> to the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, and for all his <S%H5656>service<s%>, and for the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%>.

And they <S%H935>came<s%>, <S%H5921>both<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> and <S%H802>women<s%>, as many <S%H3605>as<s%> were <S%H5081>willing<s%> <S%H3820>hearted<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H2397>bracelets<s%>, and <S%H5141>earrings<s%>, and <S%H2885>rings<s%>, and <S%H3558>tablets<s%>, all <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>: and every <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H5130>offered<s%> offered an <S%H8573>offering<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And every <S%H376>man<s%>, with whom was <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and <S%H713>purple<s%>, and <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> <S%H8438><s%>, and fine <S%H8336>linen<s%>, and <S%H5795>goats'<s%> hair, and <S%H119>red<s%> <S%H5785>skins<s%> of <S%H352>rams<s%>, and <S%H8476>badgers'<s%> <S%H5785>skins<s%>, <S%H935>brought<s%> them.

Every one that did <S%H7311>offer<s%> an <S%H8641>offering<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H5178>brass<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD'S<s%> <S%H8641>offering<s%>: and every man, with whom was <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H7848>shittim<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> for any <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H5656>service<s%>, <S%H935>brought<s%> it.

And all the <S%H802>women<s%> that were <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H3820>hearted<s%> did <S%H2901>spin<s%> with their <S%H3027>hands<s%>, and <S%H935>brought<s%> that which they had <S%H4299>spun<s%>, both of <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and of <S%H713>purple<s%>, and of <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> <S%H8438><s%>, and of fine <S%H8336>linen<s%>.
And all the <S%H802>women<s%> whose <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5375>stirred<s%> them up in <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H2901>spun<s%> <S%H5795>goats'<s%> hair.
And the <S%H5387>rulers<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H7718>onyx<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%>, and <S%H68>stones<s%> to be <S%H4394>set<s%>, for the <S%H646>ephod<s%>, and for the <S%H2833>breastplate<s%>;
And <S%H1314>spice<s%>, and <S%H8081>oil<s%> for the <S%H3974>light<s%>, and for the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%>, and for the <S%H5561>sweet<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%>.

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> a willing <S%H5071>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, every <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H802>woman<s%>, <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> made them <S%H5068>willing<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> for all manner of <S%H4399>work<s%>, which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to be <S%H6213>made<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H7200>See<s%>, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H7121>called<s%> by <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1212>Bezaleel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H221>Uri<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2354>Hur<s%>, of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>;

And he hath <S%H4390>filled<s%> him with the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, in <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, in <S%H8394>understanding<s%>, and in <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>, and in all manner of <S%H4399>workmanship<s%>;
And to <S%H2803>devise<s%> curious <S%H4284>works<s%>, to <S%H6213>work<s%> in <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and in <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and in <S%H5178>brass<s%>,

And in the <S%H2799>cutting<s%> of <S%H68>stones<s%>, to <S%H4390>set<s%> them, and in <S%H2799>carving<s%> of <S%H6086>wood<s%>, to <S%H6213>make<s%> any manner of <S%H4284>cunning<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%>.

And he hath <S%H5414>put<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart<s%> that he may <S%H3384>teach<s%>, both he, and <S%H171>Aholiab<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H294>Ahisamach<s%>, of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%>.

Them hath he <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> of <S%H3820>heart<s%>, to <S%H6213>work<s%> all manner of <S%H4399>work<s%>, of the <S%H2796>engraver<s%>, and of the cunning <S%H2803>workman<s%>, and of the <S%H7551>embroiderer<s%>, in <S%H8504>blue<s%>, and in <S%H713>purple<s%>, in <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> <S%H8438><s%>, and in fine <S%H8336>linen<s%>, and of the <S%H707>weaver<s%>, even of them that <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%>, and of those that <S%H2803>devise<s%> cunning <S%H4284>work<s%>.
